name: Mscviewer
tagline: A tool for visualization and analysis of sequence diagram chart models
body:
### Welcome to the Homepage for MSCviewer 
MSCViewer is a tool for visualization and analysis of message sequence charts. Simply put, the tool loads a text file with a subset of lines in written in a simple JSON format, and creates a sequence diagram model out of it. The user can navigate the model interactively, or even write Python script to analyze it.

### Applications
The tool is extremely useful for visualization and analysis of execution traces/logs for systems with a large number of interactive entities (processes, threads, etc.). 

An example in the context of OpenStack can be seen in this [screen capture](https://github.com/rattias/mscviewer/blob/master/doc/openstack_example.png)
